alert.note: Alert for Copiah (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 08 at 5:23PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Simpson and central Copiah Counties through 615 PM CST... At 523 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Martinsville, or near Hazlehurst, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Crystal Springs, Hazlehurst, Wesson, Gallman, Hopewell, Martinsville, Harrisville, Glancy and Beauregard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for central and south central Mississippi.
